summary.span: 使用单向链接列表实现 。

span.span: Implements using a singly linked list.

summary.span: 对于通常包含少于 10 项的集合，建议使用该实现方法。

span.span: Recommended for collections that typically include fewer than 10 items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是 使用单向链接列表的简单实现。This is a simple implementation of using a singly linked list. 如果元素数小于或等于10，则它比 a 更小且更快 。It is smaller and faster than a if the number of elements is 10 or less. 如果性能对大量元素很重要，则不应使用此值。This should not be used if performance is important for large numbers of elements. 中的项 没有任何保证顺序; 代码不应依赖于当前顺序。Items in a are not in any guaranteed order; code should not depend on the current order. 实现以实现快速键控检索; 项的实际内部顺序是依赖实现的，并且可能在未来版本的产品中发生更改。The is implemented for fast keyed retrieval; the actual internal order of items is implementation-dependent and could change in future versions of the product. 成员（如 、、 和） 是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 。Members, such as , , , and are O(`n`) operations, where `n` is . 键不能为 `null` ，但值可以为。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can. `foreach`C # 语言 `for each` 中 (Visual Basic) 的语句返回集合中元素的类型的对象。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) returns an object of the type of the elements in the collection. 由于的每个元素 都是键/值对，因此元素类型不是键的类型或值的类型。Since each element of the is a key/value pair, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 相反，元素类型为 。Instead, the element type is . 例如：For example: :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CPP/source2.cpp" id="Snippet3"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CS/source2.cs" id="Snippet3"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/VB/source2.vb" id="Snippet3"::: `foreach`语句是枚举器周围的包装器，它仅允许从集合读取，而不是写入到集合中。The `foreach` statement is a wrapper around the enumerator, which only allows reading from, not writing to, the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了的多个属性和方法 。The following code example demonstrates several of the properties and methods of . :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CPP/listdictionary.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CS/listdictionary.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/VB/listdictionary.vb" id="Snippet1":::

threadsafe.span: 此类型) 成员 Visual Basic 的公共静态 (是线程安全的。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此实现不会为 (线程安全) 包装提供同步 ，但派生类可以使用属性创建其自己的同步版本 。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property.

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 中的每个键都 必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 默认比较器是键的实现 。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 此构造函数是一个 O (1) 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了的多个属性和方法 。The following code example demonstrates several of the properties and methods of . :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CPP/listdictionary.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CS/listdictionary.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/VB/listdictionary.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 中的每个键都 必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 默认比较器是键的实现 。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 自定义比较器可以实现这样的方案：查找时不区分大小写的字符串。The custom comparer enables such scenarios as doing lookups with case-insensitive strings. 此构造函数是一个 O (1) 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

span.span: Adds an entry with the specified key and value into the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不应将其状态与其哈希代码值之间的关联的对象用作键。An object that has no correlation between its state and its hash code value should typically not be used as the key. 例如，字符串对象比用于键的 StringBuilder 对象更好。For example, String objects are better than StringBuilder objects for use as keys. 你还可以使用 属性来添加新元素，方法是设置中不存在的键的值 ; 例如 `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue` 。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the ; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 但是，如果指定的键已存在于中 ，则设置 属性会覆盖旧值。However, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反， 方法不会修改现有元素。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例在中添加和移除元素 。The following code example adds to and removes elements from a . :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove/CPP/listdictionary_addremove.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove/CS/listdictionary_addremove.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove/VB/listdictionary_addremove.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 从 .NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象的 和 方法 `key` 来确定是否 `item` 存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection's objects' and methods on `key` to determine whether `item` exists. 在 .NET Framework 的早期版本中，此决定是通过对 `item` 集合中的对象使用参数的和方法进行的。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在中搜索元素 。The following code example searches for an element in a . :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Contains/CPP/listdictionary_contains.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Contains/CS/listdictionary_contains.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Contains/VB/listdictionary_contains.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素 按枚举器循环访问的相同顺序复制到中 。The elements are copied to the in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the . 若要仅复制中的密钥 ，请使用 `ListDictionary.Keys.CopyTo` 。To copy only the keys in the , use `ListDictionary.Keys.CopyTo`. 若要仅复制中的值 ，请使用 `ListDictionary.Values.CopyTo` 。To copy only the values in the , use `ListDictionary.Values.CopyTo`. 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例将的元素复制 到一个数组中。The following code example copies the elements of a to an array. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_CopyTo/CPP/listdictionary_copyto.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_CopyTo/CS/listdictionary_copyto.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_CopyTo/VB/listdictionary_copyto.vb" id="Snippet1":::

summary.span: 返回循环访问 的 。

span.span: Returns an that iterates through the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后，并 返回 `false` 。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对的后续调用 也将返回 `false` 。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用 返回 `false` ， 则未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举的元素 。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/CPP/listdictionary_enumerator.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/CS/listdictionary_enumerator.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/VB/listdictionary_enumerator.vb" id="Snippet1":::

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsFixedSize { get; }
.property instance bool IsFixedSize
Public ReadOnly Property IsFixedSize As Boolean
public: property bool IsFixedSize { bool get(); };
member this.IsFixedSize : bool

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否具有固定大小。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the has a fixed size.
This property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 属性，因为它是接口所必需的 。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 具有固定大小的集合在创建之后不能再添加或移除元素，但是允许修改现有元素。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止添加和移除元素的包装;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，包括添加或删除元素，则固定大小的集合将反映这些更改。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsReadOnly { get; }
.property instance bool IsReadOnly
Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };
member this.IsReadOnly : bool

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否为只读。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.
This property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 属性，因为它是接口所必需的 。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 只读集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止修改集合的包装器;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否是同步的（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is synchronized (thread safe).
This property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 属性，因为它是接口所必需的 。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 派生类可以使用属性提供的同步版本 。Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the using the property. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在 整个枚举过程中锁定集合。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/VB/source2.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

param.name: key
param.span: 要获取或设置其值的键。

span.span: The key whose value to get or set.

summary.span: 获取或设置与指定的键关联的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value associated with the specified key.

value.span: 与指定的键相关联的值。

span.span: The value associated with the specified key.

value.span: 如果未找到指定的键，尝试获取它将返回 ，尝试设置它将使用指定的键创建新项。

span.span: If the specified key is not found, attempting to get it returns , and attempting to set it creates a new entry using the specified key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此属性，可以使用以下语法来访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[key]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]`. 你还可以使用 属性来添加新元素，方法是设置中不存在的键的值 ; 例如 `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue` 。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the ; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 但是，如果指定的键已存在于中 ，则设置 属性会覆盖旧值。However, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反， 方法不会修改现有元素。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 键不能为 `null` ，但值可以为。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can. 若要区分 `null` 返回的，因为找不到指定的键，并且 `null` 因为指定的键的值为而返回，则 `null` 使用 方法确定该键是否存在于列表中。To distinguish between `null` that is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` that is returned because the value of the specified key is `null`, use the method to determine if the key exists in the list. C # 语言使用[this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this)关键字来定义索引器，而不是实现 属性。The C# language uses the [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举的元素 。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/CPP/listdictionary_enumerator.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/CS/listdictionary_enumerator.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/VB/listdictionary_enumerator.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中值的顺序未 指定，但其顺序与方法返回的中的关联值的顺序相同 。The order of the values in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated values in the returned by the method. 返回的不 是静态副本; 相反，引用的是 原始中的键 。The returned is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the keys in the original . 因此，对的更改将 继续反映在中 。Therefore, changes to the continue to be reflected in the . 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举的元素 。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/CPP/listdictionary_enumerator.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/CS/listdictionary_enumerator.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/VB/listdictionary_enumerator.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不 包含具有指定键的元素，则将 保持不变。If the does not contain an element with the specified key, the remains unchanged. 不会引发异常。No exception is thrown. 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例在中添加和移除元素 。The following code example adds to and removes elements from a . :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove/CPP/listdictionary_addremove.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove/CS/listdictionary_addremove.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove/VB/listdictionary_addremove.vb" id="Snippet1":::

summary.span: 获取可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生类可以使用属性提供自己的同步版本 。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步代码必须对的执行操作 ，而不是直接在上执行操作 。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它与可能同时修改对象的其他线程保持正确的同步 。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在 整个枚举过程中锁定集合。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/VB/source2.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

summary.span: 返回循环访问 的 。

span.span: Returns an that iterates through the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置，调用会 引发异常。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后，并 返回 `false` 。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对的后续调用 也将返回 `false` 。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用 返回 `false` ，则调用会 引发异常。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合所做的更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举器将失效且不可恢复，并且对或的下一个调用将 引发 。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果在和之间修改集合 ，则 将返回它设置为的元素，即使枚举器已失效也是如此。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举的元素 。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . :::code language="cpp" remarks.format: ## Remarks 中值的顺序未 指定，但其顺序与方法返回的中的关联键的顺序相同 。The order of the values in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated keys in the returned by the method. 返回的不 是静态副本; 而是 指返回到原始中的值 。The returned is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the values in the original . 因此，对的更改将 继续反映在中 。Therefore, changes to the continue to be reflected in the . 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举的元素 。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/CPP/listdictionary_enumerator.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/CS/listdictionary_enumerator.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/VB/listdictionary_enumerator.vb" id="Snippet1":::
